name: Survive The Night (jgslayer)
description:
Survive the waves of zombies that come every night, be sure to fortify your base once the intermission hits to increase the chance of survival.

Controls:

W,A,S,D to move around 

Mouse Wheel or 1,2 to switch weapons

E to buy new weapons or interact with world

B- to go into build mode when in intermission

C- opens build menu while in build mode

Demo:

This game is still in development so please let me know of any bugs or suggestions that you might have on here or in the discord.

Discord- https://discord.gg/ms76CXJ
